lines.text: After all, it's not the principle of the thing, it's the money.

[with Mexican accent]
I am the Frisco Kid. Please come quietly, Señor, or I shall whip you.
Well, you don't have to come quietly. You could make a little noise if you like.
[Daffy and Nasty Canasta play cards; Daffy deals]

[aside]
I've got a royal straight flush full house with four aces high.

[shoving a gun down Daffy's throat]
I got a three of clubs.
I think you're pretty tough, don't I?

[Daffy has just lost a massive fight with Canasta]
I told you I'd fix his little red wagon.
[He staggers out, wheeling a little red wagon behind him]
You should have seen it. The wheels were busted, the axle was all bent, and it needed a new coat of paint. Now... now I'm going home to mother.
